required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Immunogenicity and Safety of the Vaccination of Inactivated Enterovirus 71 Vaccine and Seasonal Influenza Vaccine
clinical_study.official_title: Multiple Centers, Randomized, and Control Trail on the Immunogenicity and Safety of the Simultaneously Vaccination of Inactivated Enterovirus 71 Vaccine (EV71) and Seasonal Influenza Vaccine(SIV)

lead_sponsor.agency: Zhejiang Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention

collaborator.agency: China National Biotec Group Company Limited

clinical_study.source: Zhejiang Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the Immunogenicity and safety of the simultaneously vaccination of Inactivated Enterovirus 71 Vaccine (EV71) and seasonal influenza vaccine(SIV)

detailed_description.textblock:
Main subjects:
The seroconversion rate for each antigen when EV71 is administrated with SIV
Secondary subjects:
The positive rate of antibody for each antigen when EV71 is administrated with SIV The safety for each antigen when EV71 is administrated with SIV

primary_outcome.time_frame: change from baseline antibody concentration at 28 days after the last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: safety evaluation: The occurrence of adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 30 days after every injection

arm_group.description: Give 2 doses of Inactivated Enterovirus 71 Vaccine (EV71) and seasonal influenza vaccine(SIV) simultaneously with 28 days apart
Give 2 doses of Inactivated Enterovirus 71 Vaccine (EV71) with 28 days apart
Give 2 doses of seasonal influenza vaccine(SIV) simultaneously with 28 days apart

intervention.description: Give 2 doses of EV71 +SIV, get 2 blood samples before the first dose and 28-43 days after the last dose.
Give 2 doses of EV71 , get 2 blood samples before the first dose and 28-43 days after the last
Give 2 doses of SIV , get 2 blood samples before the first dose and 28-43 days after the last

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Parent/legal acceptable representative is willing and able to understand the protocol requirements and provide informed consent.
- Participant is aged ≥ 6 month to <12 months.
- Participant without preventive inoculation of Enterovirus 71 Vaccine ,seasonal influenza vaccine vaccine and previous history of Enterovirus.
- Subject and parent/guardian able to attend all scheduled visits and comply with all trial procedures.
- Body temperature ≤ 37.0#.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known allergy to any constituent of the vaccine.
- Known acute illness, severe chronic disease, acute exacerbation of chronic disease and fever.
- Known or suspected impairment of immunologic function, or receipt of immunosuppressive therapy or immunoglobulin since birth.
- Reported the history of allergies, convulsions, epilepsy, mental illness and brain disease and clear serious systemic reaction.
- Known bleeding disorder.
- Receipt of the whole blood, blood plasma or immunoglobulin before the trial vaccination.
- Reported the history of acute illness had need systemic antibiotics or antiviral treatment of infections in the 7 days preceding the trial vaccination.
- An acute illness with or without fever (temperature ≥ 38.0#) in the 3 days preceding enrollment in the trial.
- Participation in any other intervention clinical trial.
- Any condition which, in the opinion of the investigator, would pose a health risk to the subject or interfere with the vaccine.

facility.name: Liandu Center for Disease Control and Prevention
